snippet: President Uhuru Kenyatta said initial investigations had found that “this was a simple fire gone bad.”
abstract: Kenya's Pres Uhuru Kenyatta says investigations into huge fire that razed parts of international airport in Nairobi have found no evidence of explosion or explosive device.
lead_paragraph: President Uhuru Kenyatta said initial investigations had found that “this was a simple fire gone bad.”

headline.main: Kenyan Inquiries Find No Sign of Explosion in Airport Fire, President Says
headline.print_headline: Kenyan Inquiries Find No Sign of Explosion in Airport Fire, President Says
